channel.title: Comments for page "Idol Trash"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Idol Trash"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
You had 120 Idol Trash appraised, and got:
1 Creepy Memento - Protagonist, 3 Creepy Memento - Narrator, 116 Regular Trash

Creepy Memento - Protagonist
A stray hair, an old toothbrush, a used napkin, or something equally creepy/
(Component for a Love Potion)
Tradable Is Loopable
Is Sellable Non-Permanent

Creepy Memento - Narrator
A stray hair, an old toothbrush, a used napkin, or something equally creepy/
(Component for a Love Potion)
Tradable Is Loopable
Is Sellable Non-Permanent
